name: Gates of Survival Full Dark Theme Beta
description: A fully designed dark them for the browser game Gates of Survival.
additional_info:
Beta Version 3.6.4
- Decreased the size of the top banner and moved all 3 columns up slightly.
Beta Version 3.6.3
- Added an updated header and footer
- Fixed borders on left and right columns and left column sub menus
Beta Version 3.6.2
- Set center container height to auto. It was previously set to 100% even if there was no content to display
- fixed widths of dropdown menus on left column
- Increased the width slightly on left and right columns and adjusted the left and right padding
- Changed bootstrap panel heading and Table header background color
Beta Version 3.6.1
- Updated Image Text Color to Blue on The Legend Page
- Updated Login and Password recovery field sizes and color
- Tweaked Bootstrap pill sizes
- Fixed Margins and Padding for Content Bubbles

Beta Version 3.6
-Updated css column rules for the Nav Menus to apply to all browsers
